item.title: 美联储决议前夕，股票买家潜伏其间
item.description: 过去一周，人们越来越担心美国股市的宽幅震荡已经抑制了标准普尔500指数（S&P 500）的强劲涨势，但事实证明，股票多头仍在美联储利率决议前抢购股票。【原文：While concern has grown in the past week that narrowing breadth in the US stock market has tapped the brakes on the S&P 500’s blistering rally, it turns out that stock bulls are still stepping in to snap up shares ahead of the Fed rate decision.】

item.title: 伦敦房租以创纪录的速度上涨 加剧了劳工压力

item.title: Instagram 预计将在 2025 年创造 Meta 美国 50% 的广告销售额
item.description: 根据研究公司 Emarketer 的估计，Meta Platforms 公司的 Instagram 很快将占据该公司在美国广告收入的半壁江山，进一步巩固了这款照片和视频分享应用作为该公司主要增长动力的地位。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc.’s Instagram will soon account for half of the company’s advertising revenue in the US, according to estimates from research firm Emarketer, further cementing the photo- and video-sharing app’s role as the key growth driver for the company.】
